header.title: Suite Callbacks

erlref.modulesummary: A callback interface on top of common test

description.p: The Suite Callback framework allows extensions of the default behaviour of Common Test by means of callbacks before and after all test suite calls.
In brief, Suite Callbacks allows you to:

list.item: Manipulating the runtime config before each suite configuration calls
Manipulating the return of all suite configuration calls

description.p: The following sections describe the mandatory and optional suite callback functions Common Test will call during test execution. For more details see Suite Callbacks in the User's Guide.

section.title: CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
section.p: The following functions define the callback interface for a suite callback.
